identity.mission: Create a top 1% futuristic car rental management platform for the Algerian market.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Cyberpunk aesthetics with Swiss precision.
Emotion First: Evoke control, speed, and reliability.
Content is King: Data is the hero; the UI is the cockpit.
Zoom In: Focus on vehicle details and map precision.
Negative Space: Use deep dark space to let neon accents breathe.
Contrast: High contrast for readability in dark mode.

usage.headings: Use 'Rajdhani' for all H1-H3. Bold, uppercase for KPIs. Tracking-tight.
usage.body: Use 'IBM Plex Sans' for Latin text. Use 'IBM Plex Sans Arabic' for Arabic text.
usage.rtl_strategy: Ensure 'IBM Plex Sans Arabic' is applied automatically when dir='rtl'.

typography.installation: Add 'Rajdhani' from Google Fonts. 'IBM Plex Sans' and 'Arabic' are already present.

layout.spacing: Generous padding (p-6, p-8) inside containers. Tight gaps (gap-4) between data widgets.
layout.rtl_support: Use logical properties (ms-*, me-*, ps-*, pe-*) or Tailwind's rtl: modifiers. Ensure sidebar flips.
layout.container_style: Rounded-lg or Rounded-xl. Avoid fully sharp edges unless for specific data tables.

hero_login.description: Futuristic blue tunnel car for Login/Hero background.

map_background.description: City lights aerial for Map/Tracking section background.

maintenance_hero.description: Mechanic working on high-end car for Maintenance section.

setup: Update 'tailwind.config.js' with the 'Neon Control Room' colors.
Configure 'index.css' to use the new CSS variables for dark mode by default.
Ensure 'dir=rtl' is handled correctly in the root layout for Arabic language toggle.
implementation: Build the Dashboard using the 'Control Room' grid.
Implement the 'Clients' and 'Reservations' modules with glassmorphism cards.
Use 'Recharts' for the Analytics module with neon colors.
Ensure all inputs and forms have high contrast borders.
rtl_specifics: Use 'flex-row-reverse' where necessary if Tailwind's logical properties aren't enough.
Ensure icons flip (e.g., arrows) when in RTL mode.

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for dark colors.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures and noise overlays are encouraged.
